/usr/bin/g++      -fPIC -O0 -g3 -rdynamic CMakeFiles/optixRaycasting.dir/OptiXRaycastingContext.cpp.o CMakeFiles/optixRaycasting.dir/optixRaycasting.cpp.o ../lib/ptx/optixRaycasting_generated_optixRaycastingKernels.cu.o -o ../bin/optixRaycasting  -Wl,-rpath,/home/joewebb/OptiX2/build-SDK-Desktop-Debug/lib:/home/joewebb/OptiX2/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/lib64 ../lib/libsutil_sdk.so /home/joewebb/OptiX2/lib64/liboptix.so -Wl,--disable-new-dtags -lm /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -lrt -ldl -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lOpenGL -lGLX -lGLU /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnvrtc.so
